sys_script_include.description: Create a new field “Manager Email” and “Manager Mobile Number”. Based on the Manager selected, these fields should be auto populated from its employee details. When Manager changes, these should also be updated accordingly. (Hint: Script Include)
sys_script_include.name: W5_Manager_Email
